item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, September 21, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Scaling up linear programming with PDLP (104 points | 20 comments)
2. Ultra high-resolution image of The Night Watch (355 points | 100 comments)
3. Omega-3 intake counteracts symptoms of anxiety and depression in mice (101 points | 45 comments)

9. Kraftful (YC S19) is hiring a founder engineer ( | hide)

24. Kubesafe: Never run Kubernetes commands on the wrong cluster again (60 points | 34 comments)
25. Reactive Relational Algebra (162 points | 31 comments)

27. Gaining access to anyones Arc browser without them even visiting a website (1327 points | 447 comments)

29. CuPy: NumPy and SciPy for GPU (346 points | 97 comments)
